name: Battlefield V Trial
description:
Play the Battlefield™ V Trial and experience all-out multiplayer war across iconic and unexpected WW2 battlefields. As the trial progresses, you’ll sample several game modes on a rolling schedule, along with all the single-player War Stories. Pick your class, assemble your squad, and deploy – into the richest and most immersive Battlefield™ yet.

• All-out multiplayer: Play the objective with your squad in vast modes like Rush, Grand Operations, and more. Deploy with a sandbox of weapons, vehicles, and destruction to dispose of your foes. • Operation Underground: Get access to the latest map, inspired by the legendary Operation Métro. Charge through subway tunnels and a war-ridden plaza in this intense infantry setting. • Single-player: Experience global conflict in all the dramatic and action-packed War Stories, taking you across the globe.

For a detailed schedule, download the Battlefield™ V Trial

LIMITED TIME FREE TRIAL. YOU MUST BE 13+ TO PLAY. TRIAL TIME IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE. INTERNET CONNECTION, EA ACCOUNT, ACCEPTANCE OF EA USER AGREEMENT AND PRIVACY AND COOKIE POLICY, INSTALLATION OF THE ORIGIN CLIENT SOFTWARE (origin.com/about) REQUIRED TO PLAY. TRIAL CAN BE PLAYED ONCE PER EA ACCOUNT AND COMPUTER. VALID WHEREVER TRIAL IS AVAILABLE.
